head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DEMIRJIAN, ARTO JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DEMIRJIAN, ARTO JR.

block.p: DeMIRJIAN--Arto Jr., 76. We are saddened to announce the death of our beloved friend after a valiant battle. Loving uncle, cousin and godfather; devoted companion of Howard Siegman; long time publishing professional and mystery writer, vibrant wit. Manhattan bicycle enthusiast. Vital member of the NY literary community; resident of NYC and East Hampton. Good night, dear heart. Memorial Saturday, February 3. Call 212-998-8312
